items.title: Fun Fact
items.description: Each Ogham letter traditionally corresponds to a tree, like B = Beith (Birch). Known as the 'Celtic Tree Alphabet'.

items.title: Fun Fact
items.description: The Ogham block in Unicode is U+1680–U+169F, with U+1680 'Ogham Space Mark' being the only space character.
